Text.val: 07.02.2007 AK SCR12205 some changes in the spec
29.01.2007 AK SCR12205 some changes in the spec
if P.IN is empty ==> do nothing
Check if table DHRW is alredy in memory
beginning with step 9 - by default handle all parts
-- 9 -- default handling (first char Upper and the rest Lower )
build the output stirng form the vector

ExpSyntax.val: Lower (Left ({0,6},2))='d’' OR Lower (Left ({0,6},2))='l’' OR Lower (Left ({0,6},2))='d''' OR Lower (Left ({0,6},2))='l''' OR Lower (Left ({0,6},2))='d´' OR Lower (Left ({0,6},2))='l´'
ISNULL (GetParam ('DHRW10')) OR GetParam ('DHRW10')='' OR ISNULL (GetParam ('DHRW11')) OR GetParam ('DHRW11')=''

Text.val: The first char of the first matched word sould be in Caps letter (loopCounter=1)
If it is not the first word then it should be total in lower case
strip dots from current cell variables
starting only after the second char
